name: Boa
description:
Created by Steven Miller for miniLD #67: Classic Mash Remix

Solve puzzles, avoid enemies, and get to the goal in this turn-based Snake remix.

Features:
20 levels over 5 stages, each with a new mechanic
Controller support
Various enemies and traps
Some audio
A save system to store your settings and progress
A level select screen so you can play any level you want
